content: **knitted jacket in drops air piece is knitted top down with raglan lace pattern and v-neck size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ai-315 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 300-350-400-400-450-500 g colour no 02 wheat **knitting gauge** 17 stitches in width and 22 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 5 mm drops circular needle size 5 mm length 60 or 80 cm for edges in stocking stitch drops double pointed needles size 4 mm drops circular needle size 4 mm length 80 cm for rib drops cable needle - for cables needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size drops button marble nr 629 5-5-5-5-5-5 pieces
